chapter.text: alif laam raa ye ktaabe ilaahi ki aayate hai aur khole aur roushan Qur’an ki
wo bhi waqt hoga, ke kaafir apne musalmaan hone ki aarzo karenge
aap unhe khaata, nafa uthaata aur (jhoti) ummido mein mashghool hota chohd dijiye, ye khud abhi jaan lenge
kisi basti ko hum ne halaak nahi kiya magar ye ke us ke liye muqarrara navishta1 tha
koyi gruh apni mauth se na aage badta hai na piche rehta hai
unhone kaha ke aye wo shaqs jis par Qur’aan utara gaya hai yaqinan tu, to koyi diwana hai
agar tu saccha hee hai to hamaare paas farishto ko kyo nahi laata
hum farishto ko haq ke saath hee utaarte hai aur us waqt wo mahulath diye gaye nahi hote
hum ne hee is Qur’an ko naazil farmaya hai aur hum hee is ke muhaafiz hai
hum ne aap se pehle agli ummato mein bhi apne rasool (baraabar) bheje
aur (lekin) jo bhi rasool aata wo us ka mazaaq udaate
gunahgaaro ke dilo mein hum isi tarah yahi racha diya karte hai
wo us par imaan nahi laate aur yaqinan aglo ka tariqa guzra hoa hai
aur agar hum un par aasmaan ka darwaza khol bhi de aur ye waha chadne bhi lag jaaye
tab bhi yahi kahenge ke hamari nazar bandi kardi gayi hai, balke hum logo par jaadu kar diya gaya hai
yaqinan hum ne aasmaan mein burj2 banaaye hai aur dekhne walo ke liye ose sajaa diya gaya hai
aur ose har mardoodh shaitaan se mehfooz rakha hai
haan magar jo chori chupe sunne ki koshish kare us ke piche dehekta hoa (khula shola) lagta hai
aur zameen ko hum ne phaila diya hai aur us par (atal) pahaad daal diye hai aur us mein hum ne har cheez ek muayyan meghdaar se ugaadi hai
aur osi mein hum ne tumhari roziya banadi hai aur jinhe tum rozi dene wale nahi ho
aur jitni bhi cheeze hai un sub ke khazaane hamare paas hai aur hum har cheez ko us ke muqarrara andaaz se utaarte hai
aur hum bhejte hai bhujal hawaae phir aasmaan se paani barsa kar wo tumhe pilaate hai aur tum us ka zaqira karne wale nahi ho
hum hee jilaate hai aur maarte hai aur hum hee (bil aaqar) waaris hai
aur tum mein se aage badne wale aur piche hatne wale bhi hamare ilm mein hai
aap ka rab sab logo ko jama karega yaqinan wo badi hikmato wala bade ilm wala hai
yaqinan hum ne insaan ko kaali aur sadi hoyi khan-khanaati mitti se paida farmaya hai
aur us se pehle jinnaath ko hum ne loo wali aag se paida kiya
aur jab tere parvardigaar ne farishto se farmaya ke main ek insaan ko kaali aur sadi hoyi khan-khanaati mitti se paida karne wala hoon
to jab main ose pura bana chuko, aur us mein apni ruh phok doon to tum sub us ke liye sajde mein gir padna
chuna che tamaam farishto ne, sab ke sab ne sajda kar liya
magar iblees ke, ke us ne sajda karne walo mein shamuliyath karne se (saaf) inkaar kar diya
(Allah ta’ala ne) farmaya aye iblees, tujhe kya hoa ke tu sajda karne walo mein shamil na hoa
wo bola ke main aisa nahi ke is insaan ko sajda karo jise tu ne kaali aur sadi hoyi khan-khanaati mitthi se paida kiya hai
farmaya ab tu bahisht se nikal ja kyo ke tu raanda darga3 hai
aur tujh par meri phitkaar hai qayaamat ke din tak
kehne laga ke aye mere rub mujhe us din tak ki dheel de ke log dubaara utha khade kiye jaaye
farmaya ke accha tu un mein se hai jinhe muhullath mili hai
roze muqarrar tak ke waqt ki
(shaitaan ne) kaha ke aye mere rab! chu ke tu ne mujhe gumrah kiya hai mujhe bhi qasam hai ke main bhi zameen mein un ke liye mu-aasi4 ko muzayyan5 karonga aur un sab ko behkaaonga bhi
sivaae tere un bandho ke jo muntaqab kar liye gaye hai
irshaad hoa ke haan yahi mujh tak pahonchne ki sidhi raah hai
mere bandho par tujhe koi ghalba nahi lekin haan jo gumraah log teri pairvi kare
yaqinan un sub ke waade ki jageh jahannam hai
jis ke saath darwaaze hai, har darwaaze ke liye un ka ek hissa bata hoa hai
parhezgaar jannati log baagho aur chashmo mein honge
(un se kaha jayega) salaamti aur aman ke saath is mein dakhil ho jao
un ke dilo mein jo kuch ranjish wa kina tha hum sub kuch nikaal denge, wo bhai bhai bane hoye ek dosre ke aamne saamne taqto par baithe honge
na to waha unhe koi takleef cho sakti hai aur na wo wahaa se kabhi nkaale jayenge
mere bandho ko qabar de do ke main bahuth hee baqshne wala aur bada hee meherbaan hoon
aur saath hee mere azaab bhi nihaayath dardnaak hai
unhe ibraheem ke mehmaano ka (bhi) haal suna do
ke jab unhone un ke paas aa kar salaam kaha to unhone kaha ke hum ko to tum se dar lagta hai
unhone kaha daro nahi, hum tujhe ek saahebe ilm farzand ki bashaarat dete hai
kaha kya is bhudaape ke aa jaane ke baadh tum mujhe khush qabri dete ho! ye khush qabri tum kaise de rahe ho
unhone kaha hum aap ko bilkul sacchi khush qabri sunaate hai, aap mayoos logo mein shaamil na ho
kaha apne rab ta’ala ki rehmat se na ummid to sirf gumraah aur behke hoye log hee hote hai
pucha ke Allah ke bheje hoye (farishto!) tumhara aisa kya ehem kaam hai
unhone jawaab diya ke hum mujrim khaum ki taraf bheje gaye hai
magar khandaan looth ke, hum un sub ko to zaroor bacha lenge
sivayae us (looth) ki biwi ke, ke hum ne ose rukne aur baaqi reh jaane walo mein muqarrar kar diya hai
jab bheje hoye farishte aale looth ke paas pahonche
to unhone (looth alaihissalaam) ne kaha tum log to kuch anjaan se maloom ho rahe ho
unhone kaha nahi balke hum tere paas wo cheez laye hai jis mein ye log shak shuba kar rahe thein
hum to tere paas (sarih) haq laaye hai aur hai bhi bilkul sacche

ab tu apne khandaan sameth is raath ke kisi hisse mein chal de, aur aap un ke piche rehna aur (qabardaar) tum mein se koyi (piche) mud kar bhi na dekhe aur jahaan ka tumhe hukm kiya ja raha hai waha chale jaana
aur hum ne us ki taraf is baath ka faisla kar diya ke subah hote hote un logo ki jade kaat di jayengi
aur shahar waale khushiya manaate hoye aaye
(looth alaihissalaam ne) kaha ye log mere mehmaan hai, tum mujhe ruswa na karo
Allah ta’ala se daro aur mujhe ruswa na karo
wo bole kya hum ne tujhe dunya bhar (ki theke daari) se mana nahi kar rakha
(looth alaihissalaaam ne) kaha agar tumhe karna hee hai to ye meri bacchiya maujoodh hai
teri umr ki qasam! wo to apni badh masti mein sar garda thein
pas suraj nikalte nikalte unhe ek bade zoor ki awaaz ne pakad liya
bil aaqir hum ne us shahar ko upar ta-le kar diya aur un logo par kankar waale patthar barsaaye
bila shuba basirath walo ke liye us mein bahuth si nishaaniya hai
ye basti aisi raah par hai jo baraabar chalti rehti (aam guzar gaah) hai
aur us mein imaan walo ke liye badi nishaani hai
ye ke basti ke rehne wale bhi bade zaalim thein
jin se (aaqir) hum ne inteqaam le hee liya, ye duno shehar khole (aam) raaste par hai
aur hijr walo ne bhi rasulo ko jhutlaaya
aur hum ne un ko apni nishaaniya bhi ataa farmaai (lekin) taaham wo un se ro gardaani hee karte rahe
ye log pahaado ko taraash taraash kar ghar banaate thein be khauf ho kar
aaqir unhe bhi subah hote hote chinghaad ne aa dabocha
pas un ki kisi tadbeer wa amal ne unhe koyi fayeda na diya
hum ne aasmaano aur zameen ko aur un ke darmiyaan ki sab cheezo ko haq ke saath hee paida farmaya hai aur qayaamath zaroor zaroor aane wali hai, pas tu husn wa qoobi aur (acchaayi) se darguzar karle
yaqinan tera parvardigaar hee paida karne wala aur jaanne wala hai
yaqinan hum ne aap ko saath aayate de rakhi hai ke dohraayi jaati hai aur azeem Qur’aan bhi de rakha hai
aap har giz apni nazre us cheez ki taraf na daudaaye jis se hum ne un mein se kayi qism ke logo ko behra mandh kar rakha hai, na un par aap afsoos kare aur momino ke liye apne baazo jhukaaye rahe
aur keh dijiye ke main to khullam khulla daraane wala hoon
jaise ke hum ne un taqseem karne waalo par utara
jinhone is kitaab ilaahi ke tukde tukde kar diye
qasam hai tere paalne wale ki!hum un sab se zaroor baaz purs karenge
har us cheez ki jo wo karte thein
pas aap us hukm ko jo aap ko kiya ja raha hai khol kar suna dijiye! aur mushriko se mu pher lijiye
aap se jo log masqara pan karte hai, un ki saza ke liye hum kaafi hai
jo Allah ke saath dosre maboodh muqarrar karte hai, unhe an-qareeb maloom ho jayega
hamein qoob ilm hai ke un ki baatho se aap ka dil tang hota hai
aap apne parvardigaar ki tasbih aur hamd bayaan karte rahe aur sajda karne walo mein shaamil ho jaye
aur apne rub ki ibaadath karte rahe, yahaa tak ke aap ko mauth aa jaaye
